snippet.title: Gadgets: Design It! Build It! Play It! (2002) - All Tutorial Levels
snippet.description:
Gadgets: Design It! Build It! Play It!, also known as "Chain Reaction" is a puzzle game developed by Monster Studios, and published by GarageGames in 2002. This game is based on Sierra's The Incredible Machine series from 1992. 

The version shown in this video is the 2003 release by eGames.

Fun fact: The founder of GarageGames (Jeff Tunnell) was a producer of "The Incredible Machine" series. And GarageGames was a publishing partner of Sierra in 2001.

Recorded with: OBS 30.1.2
Edited with: Vegas Pro 16
